channel.title: CLI on Fossix
channel.description: Recent content in CLI on Fossix

item.title: Command Line for beginners - Email
item.description: An attempt to create a series of articles targetting audencies who are beginning their command line journey. This post speaks about how to setup your email and view mails in a command line client.

item.title: Twitter From The Command Line
item.description: We all love to tweet.. but how to do that right from you favourite command line?

item.title: Sending SMS from the command line in Jolla
item.description: A shell script to send SMS from the command line interface of sailfish.. and also see the Easter egg inside sailfish

item.title: Terminal Shortcuts! (Compilation)
item.description: Few shortcuts to enhance your commandline skills
